text: Ate jekara asim usa nu dukha tom ba'ada, jihara ki usa nu mili'a si, kirapa (nihala) kara dide ham ta uha akhade hana ki iha tam sada haka si. (Ate akhade hana ki) asim nahim samajhade ki kade ki'amata avegi. Ate jekara apane raba vala vapisa more vi ga'e tam usa kola mere la'i sresata (sukha) hi hana. So asim inham inakari'am nu inham de karama to savadhana zarura karange. Ate inham nu sakhata saza da maza cakhavange
